topic.title: Editorial Comment on the Underlying Source (//fileDesc/sourceDesc/biblFull/notesStmt)

body.p: Editorial notes on the underlying source are given within the <biblFull> specification of the Source Description in the <notesStmt> element. The respective text of the comment can be found in the Notes statement in the sub-element <note type="remarkSource">.

The notes in <notesStmt> include, for example, the reasons for the choice of the edition if it does not correspond to the first edition of the work. Furthermore, faulty or incomplete information of the title page which has been replaced by the correct or normalized information in the metadata of the TEI header is documented here.
